Bash(gh pr create --title "fix: UI improvements - onboarding modal centering, accessibility, and form fixes" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

This PR combines multiple UI/UX improvements:

### 1. Onboarding Modal Fix
- **Fixed**: Modal stuck to bottom of screen on mobile devices
- **Changed**: `items-end md:items-center` â†’ `items-center` for consistent vertical centering across all screen sizes
- **Impact**: Improved mobile UX - modal now appears centered on all devices

### 2. Debug Button Cleanup
- **Removed**: "Break the world" error button from `main.tsx`
- **Reason**: Development-only test button that shouldn''t be in codebase

### 3. Accessibility Improvements (from PR #13)
- Added skip link and main landmark for keyboard navigation
- Enhanced semantic structure with proper ARIA labels
- Improved focus management in onboarding dialog
- WCAG 2.1 AA compliance improvements for header/search controls
- Live regions for screen reader announcements

### 4. Form Submission Fix (from PR #18)
- **Fixed**: MediaTile add button triggering parent form submissions
- **Changed**: Added `type="button"` to prevent form submission
- **Added**: Regression test to prevent future issues

## Testing

### Onboarding Modal
âœ… All onboarding tests passing (6/6)
```bash
npm run test -- src/components/onboarding/__tests__/
```

### Visual Testing
- [ ] Verify modal appears centered on mobile (< 768px width)
- [ ] Verify modal appears centered on desktop (â‰¥ 1024px)
- [ ] Verify modal appears right-aligned on tablets (768-1023px)
- [ ] Test keyboard navigation (Tab, Escape, Arrow keys)
- [ ] Test with screen reader

### Form Behavior
- [ ] Verify MediaTile add button doesn''t submit parent forms
- [ ] Verify quick wigg modal opens correctly

## Screenshots

Before: Modal stuck to bottom on mobile
After: Modal centered on all screen sizes

## Related Issues

Closes issues related to:
- Onboarding modal positioning on mobile
- Accessibility compliance
- Form submission bugs

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
